page.description: The .Change_Begin() method indicates that you are about to change the value of a field rule. Use <TBL>.RULES_GET() to create the pointer.
page.example: dim tbl as P dim fr as P tbl = table.open("invoice_header") fr = tbl.rules_get() fr.change_begin() fr.date.skip = "F" fr.change_end(.t.) tbl.close()
